column4: i go to hardware driver and saying : no proprietary drivers are in use on this system.

not normal or off something like that
I have Ati RAdeon 9200 <-- but driver ??? :| how i Install the driver for linux ??
use the open driver for that
you don't need the proprietary driver, you'll get better results using the open source "ati" one
what is it you're trying to do?
open a terminal and type glxgears
and let me know what kind of FPS values you get.

hmmm....i didn't know you could get water and rain effects...then again, i didn't know you could get 1100+fps out of a radeon 9200...that's the same chipset as the one i just gave away....did you do anything to driconf, or did it do that "out of the box" so to speak?
